name: Lost Legends: The Weeping Woman HD - A Colorful Hidden Object Mystery
name_original: Lost Legends: The Weeping Woman HD - A Colorful Hidden Object Mystery
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

Your investigative report on the Weeping Woman of San Cristobal turns personal after you witness a kidnapping. Is the legend true?

• INVESTIGATE A LOCAL LEGEND
Every year, the town of San Cristobal holds a huge festival to soften the heart of the Weeping Woman—a bitter spirit who kidnapped children long ago.

• NEXT STOP: MEXICO!
Explore the vibrant streets of San Cristobal and enjoy the festive decorations! Search for clues, solve puzzles and hidden object scenes, and then explore the town while you talk to the locals in order to get to the bottom of this mysterious legend.

• SOLVE THE MYSTERY OF THE MISSING CHILDREN
Three years ago, a child went missing during the festival for real, with another child vanishing each year since! Now another child has been taken right before your eyes!

• DISCOVER THE TALE OF EL SOMBRERÓN IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Collect morphing flowers and keep an eye out for hidden golden skulls! Once you’ve earned all of the achievements, enjoy some stunning wallpapers and concept art!

*This game is best experienced on iPhone 4s/iPod Touch 5th gen and up.*
